sixsteps.subtitle: Простой гайд, который облегчит твою торговлю криптовалютой
sixsteps.title: 6 шагов для легкого старта с BTC-X
sixsteps.step_1_subtitle: Начните свое путешествие в мир выгодной торговли, загрузив наше приложение из App Store или Google Play. Установите его и подготовьтесь к новым возможностям.
sixsteps.step_2_subtitle: Пройдите простой процесс регистрации, обязательно указав реферальный код, чтобы получить привилегии «без комиссий». Этот шаг откроет для вас лучшие условия торговли.
sixsteps.step_3_subtitle: Подтвердите свою личность за несколько простых шагов, чтобы получить полный доступ ко всем функциям платформы.
sixsteps.step_4_title: Пополните счет и укажите торговую силу
sixsteps.step_4_subtitle: Добавьте средства на счет и настройте торговую силу, чтобы получить больше возможностей для работы на рынке. Это позволит открывать большие позиции без риска ликвидации вашего депозита.
sixsteps.step_5_subtitle: Открывайте сделки и используйте все доступные инструменты для максимальной эффективности. Благодаря честным условиям и отсутствию комиссий вы сосредотачиваетесь только на прибыли.
sixsteps.step_6_subtitle: Общайтесь, делитесь опытом и развивайтесь вместе с нашим активным трейдинговым сообществом. Почувствуйте силу поддержки единомышленников и расти вместе с BTC-X.
sixsteps.quotes_text: Торговля с BTC-X стала приятнее благодаря 0% комиссиям и прозрачным условиям.

faq.title: Ответы на часто задаваемые вопросы
faq.answer_1: BTC-X.PRO — это мобильная торговая платформа, которая позволяет пользователям по всему миру получать экономическую выгоду от движения цен на такие финансовые инструменты, как акции, криптовалюты, ETF, товарные фьючерсы и фиатные валютные пары.
faq.answer_2: Для регистрации на BTC-X.PRO необходимо установить приложение BTC-X.PRO из Play Market или App Store. Затем в самом приложении в разделе «Аккаунт» пройти простую процедуру регистрации.
faq.answer_3: В BTC-X.PRO, в отличие от других торговых площадок или бирж, полностью отсутствуют какие-либо комиссии и сборы. Кроме того, торговля осуществляется по спотовым ценам, что исключает возможность манипуляций, характерных для маржинальной торговли на большинстве бирж.
faq.question_4: Нужно ли платить комиссию за вывод средств с аккаунта в BTC-X.PRO?
faq.answer_4: Если при регистрации вы указали реферальный код человека, который порекомендовал вам BTC-X.PRO, то комиссия сети за вывод средств с вас взиматься не будет. Эту комиссию оплатит BTC-X.PRO.
faq.subtitle: Скачивайте приложение BTC-X и получите доступ к торговле без комиссий уже сегодня

aboutUs.title: О нас
aboutUs.subtitle: BTC-X - ваш надежный проводник в мире трейдинга
aboutUs.text: Мы - команда цифровых энтузиастов с глубоким опытом в финансовых рынках, которая успешно сотрудничает с ведущими компаниями криптовалютной индустрии
aboutUs.title_2: Этот опыт вдохновил нас создать BTC-X - проект с уникальным преимуществом: торговлю маржинальными позициями
aboutUs.subtitle_2: без комиссии в течение всего 2025 года.
aboutUs.text_2: Сочетая экспертность и инновационный подход мы работаем над созданием удобных и прозрачных решений, чтобы сделать финансовые технологии доступными для каждого пользователя.
aboutUs.subtitle_3: Наша миссия - это не просто цель, а глобальная задача, которая формирует будущее.
aboutUs.title_3_mobile: Мы хотим, чтобы все могли легко и безопасно работать с финансовыми активами.
aboutUs.title_3_desktop: Мы хотим, чтобы все могли легко и безопасно работать с финансовыми активами. Именно поэтому наше приложение доступно для загрузки в App Store и Google Play почти во всем мире.
aboutUs.text_3: Именно поэтому наше приложение доступно для загрузки в App Store и Google Play почти во всем мире.

opportunities.opportunities_1_text: Покупайте и продавайте различные финансовые активы по спотовым ценам, используя данные с ведущих глобальных и криптовалютных бирж в реальном времени
opportunities.opportunities_2_text: Торговать без комиссий как на спотовом рынке, так и на фьючерсах, включая акции и мемокоины.
opportunities.opportunities_3_text: Торговать с кредитным плечом без дополнительных комиссий, что значительно увеличивает потенциальную прибыль.

howItWorks.title: Как это работает в цифрах
howItWorks.trade_example_title: Предположим, вы хотите совершить торговлю на $1000. Большинство крупных бирж взимают комиссию за сделку, которая может колебаться от 0.1% до 0.5%. Это означает, что при торговле на $1000, вы могли бы заплатить от $1 до $5 только за комиссию.
howItWorks.no_fees_text: Забудь о комиссиях - торгуй выгодно и без ограничений с BTC-X
howItWorks.leverage_trading_title: Торговля с кредитным плечом и комиссия
howItWorks.leverage_trading_text: Если комиссия составляет 0.1%, вы заплатите $10 за сделку на $10,000. Если комиссия составляет 0.5%, вы заплатите $50 за ту же сделку
howItWorks.leverage_trading_example_title: Если вы используете кредитное плечо 20x, то при депозите в $1000 вы

aboutToken.step_3_subtitle: Ваш торговый объем приносит баллы, которые автоматически конвертируются в токены BTCXT.

launchingToken.price_formation_details: Расчет цены через спред между ценой покупки и продажи способствует формированию прозрачной и динамичной стоимости, которая отражает реальную рыночную активность.

aml.financial_crime_compliance_statement: Политика по предотвращению легализации доходов, добытых преступным путем, финансирования терроризма и политика “Знай своего клиента”

introduction.title: Введение
introduction.paragraph1: Политика по предотвращению легализации доходов, добытых преступным путем, финансирования терроризма и Политика «Знай Своего Клиента» (далее – «Политика») предназначена для предотвращения и снижения возможных рисков BTC-X.PRO быть вовлеченным в какую-либо незаконную деятельность.
introduction.list1_item1: Защищать клиентов, сотрудников (постоянных и контрактных) и других лиц, с которыми мы ведем бизнес;
introduction.list1_item2: Поддерживать правительства, регулирующие органы и правоохранительные органы в более широком предотвращении экономических преступлений. BTC-X.PRO не потерпит никаких намеренных нарушений законов и нормативных актов по борьбе с финансовыми преступлениями (например, взяточничество, коррупция, отмывание денег и финансирование терроризма, санкции, уклонение от уплаты налогов или рыночные манипуляции), которые применимы к нашей деятельности.
introduction.paragraph2: BTC-X.PRO имеет специальную глобальную функцию по борьбе с финансовыми преступлениями, которая находится в подразделении Compliance. Функция по борьбе с финансовыми преступлениями облегчает эффективное и своевременное управление рисками финансовых преступлений, предоставляя экспертную поддержку и контроль за бизнесом в юрисдикциях, в которых ведется деятельность.

governance.title: Управление
governance.paragraph1: Главный Compliance Officer (CCO) отвечает за соблюдение всех применимых законодательных актов и обязательств по борьбе с отмыванием денег (AML) и финансовыми преступлениями в юрисдикциях, где осуществляется деятельность. Кроме того, CCO отвечает за разработку и поддержание программы AML, направленной на идентификацию, оценку, мониторинг и управление рисками, связанными с отмыванием денег, финансированием терроризма и другими финансовыми преступлениями. CCO поддерживается MLRO в соответствующих юрисдикциях, которые несут общую ответственность за создание и поддержание эффективного контроля финансовых преступлений и выполнение повседневных задач, связанных с AML.

policies_and_procedures.title: Политики и процедуры
policies_and_procedures.paragraph1: Политика по борьбе с отмыванием денег BTC-X.PRO охватывает шесть ключевых областей риска:
policies_and_procedures.list1_item1: Противодействие отмыванию денег и финансированию терроризма (AML&CTF);
policies_and_procedures.paragraph2: Наш комплексный подход к финансовым преступлениям позволяет нам выявлять и управлять важными синергиями и связями между ключевыми рисками. Все политики и процедуры доступны для сотрудников в любое время. Кроме того, все политики:
policies_and_procedures.list2_item1: Разработаны для обеспечения того, чтобы все сотрудники, бизнесы и юридические лица соблюдали экстерриториальные обязательства и применимые законодательные акты в странах, где ведет деятельность BTC-X.PRO;
policies_and_procedures.list2_item2: Одобрены Советом директоров и применимы ко всем сущностям в группе BTC-X.PRO;
policies_and_procedures.list2_item3: Подлежат ежегодному обзору, чтобы обеспечить их эффективность, предоставляя старшему руководству уверенность в соответствии с системой контроля за финансовыми преступлениями.

mitigation_and_management_of_financial_c.title: Снижение и управление рисками финансовых преступлений
mitigation_and_management_of_financial_c.paragraph1: BTC-X.PRO разработала и внедрила комплекс мер по снижению, выявлению и управлению рисками финансовых преступлений. Эти меры включают:
mitigation_and_management_of_financial_c.list1_item3: Обучение и повышение осведомленности сотрудников BTC-X.PRO;

country_of_residence.title: Страна пребывания
country_of_residence.paragraph1: Политика BTC-X.PRO по борьбе с отмыванием денег и финансированием терроризма задает рисковую аппетит компании в отношении клиентов. BTC-X.PRO не принимает клиентов, которые проживают в странах, которые превышают рисковую аппетит. К ним относятся:

disputed_territories.paragraph: BTC-X.PRO также не принимает клиентов со спорных или непризнанных территорий, поскольку эти территории не производят признанные официальные документы. К таким территориям относятся:

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Protecting the privacy and safeguarding the personal and financial information of our users and website visitors is one of our highest priorities. This privacy policy ("Policy") explains how the BTC-X.PRO group (collectively "BTC-X.PRO", "we" or "us" and each member of the BTC-X.PRO group for whose services you registered, "BTC-X.PRO entity") collects, uses, and discloses personal information through its websites, mobile applications, and other products and services that link to this Policy, including any of the products and services detailed in the following paragraph (collectively, "the Services") or when you otherwise interact with us. BTC-X.PRO provides a mobile application ("BTC-X.PRO App"), and/or BTC-X.PRO website https://btc-x.pro that allows users to obtain economic exposure to the price movement of an underlying financial instrument (including stocks, ETFs, commodity futures, index futures, cryptocurrency pairs, and fiat currency pairs) without the need for ownership and physical settlement of the underlying financial instrument. The Services include providing: (i) the BTC-X.PRO App, (ii) any additional services which facilitate money servicing payments and wallet services, and/or (iii) any other site, web platform, mobile application or other service facilitated by any BTC-X.PRO entity (any account described in (i)+(ii) being a "BTC-X.PRO Account" for the purpose of this Policy). By utilizing the Services, you expressly consent to the collection and use of personal information by BTC-X.PRO as explained in this Policy. This Policy forms part of the relevant BTC-X.PRO Entity’s terms and conditions, terms of business, agreement with you and/or terms of use as the case may be. If you accept or agree to this Policy on behalf of a company or other legal entity, you represent and warrant that you have the authority to bind that company or other legal entity to this Policy and, in such event, "you" and "your" will refer and apply to that company or other legal entity.

sections.informationAboutUseOfServices: INFORMATION ABOUT YOUR USE OF BTC-X.PRO SERVICES
sections.securityOfYourPersonalInformation: SECURITY AND INTEGRITY OF YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION

collectionOfPersonalInformation.intro: We collect your personal information directly from you and indirectly as a result of your relationship with us. For example, we collect information when you create a BTC-X.PRO account, participate in any interactive features of the Services, fill out a form, participate in a BTC-X.PRO contest or promotion, make a purchase, communicate with BTC-X.PRO via third party social media sites, request user support, or otherwise communicate with us.
collectionOfPersonalInformation.signUpTitle: When You Sign Up or Register for a BTC-X.PRO Account or Services
collectionOfPersonalInformation.signUpContent: If you sign up for a BTC-X.PRO Account or other Services, we will collect information about you including your name, email address, nationality, telephone number, date of birth, credit card, wallet address. We may also request additional information such as your gender, place of birth, addresses, citizenship and residency status, tax identification numbers, and information about your experience trading, education, source of income, investment aims and appetite, occupation, annual income, and other details or questions as may be required in the profile creation and the opening process as may be amended by us from time to time. We will also ask you to provide a copy of an identification document, such as a passport, visa or national identity card, a utility bill and such other documents as may be required by us in order to comply with our regulatory obligations and to verify your identity. Further details about the identification process can be found in the relevant BTC-X.PRO Entity’s terms and conditions, terms of business and/or terms of use, as the case may be. You may provide this information to us directly, or by signing into your account/service with a third party, including without limitation, a third party social media platform or search engine. We will use the information that we collect about you to:

signUpList.collectInformation_1: create and maintain your BTC-X.PRO Account;
signUpList.collectInformation_2: allow you to log in to BTC-X.PRO;
signUpList.collectInformation_3: verify your identity and carry out checks that we are required to conduct by applicable laws and regulations,"know your customer" (KYC), anti-money laundering, fraud, sanctions, and politically exposed person (PEP) checks;
signUpList.collectInformation_4: contact you on matters relating to your BTC-X.PRO Account, including to request any additional information or documentation, provide you with notices related to your BTC-X.PRO Account, general updates, market updates, and other marketing materials, including about the Services offered by BTC-X.PRO;
signUpList.collectInformation_5: tailor the products and services offered to you, including without limitation, to perform any suitability or appropriateness assessments for using our Services and/or products;
signUpList.collectInformation_6: assess your risk and maintain administrative services relating to our business;
signUpList.collectInformation_7: set up security measures to secure your account and provide the Services;

collectionOfPersonalInformation.contactUsContent: If you contact us by telephone, email, chat, social media platform messaging, post, or use any another function offered by BTC-X.PRO, such as the chat feature, we will collect any information about the communication and any additional information that you choose to give us. We will use this information to review, investigate, and respond to any comment or question that you may raise. Please note that we record and retain all telephone calls and other communication with us and may use it in our dealings with you, including any dispute resolution or legal proceedings.
collectionOfPersonalInformation.invitesTitle: When a BTC-X.PRO User Invites You to Use BTC-X.PRO
collectionOfPersonalInformation.invitesContent: Users of BTC-X.PRO can invite their contacts to sign up for an account with us. We only collect the email addresses of individuals that users choose to invite to join BTC-X.PRO and BTC-X.PRO only uses the email addresses for sending an invitation to the individual at the request of the existing BTC-X.PRO user.

informationAboutUseOfServices.intro: When you access or use our Services, we automatically collect information about you, including:

serviceUsageInformation.financialInformation: Financial Information: We may collect financial information related to your use of the Services, including information you provide to us or that we collect from public sources.
serviceUsageInformation.logInformation: Log Information: We collect log information about your use of the Services, including the type of browser you use, app version, access times, pages viewed, your IP address, any other network identifiers, and the page you visited before navigating to our Services.
serviceUsageInformation.deviceInformation: Device Information: We collect information about the computer or mobile device you use to access our Services, including the hardware model, operating system and version, unique device identifiers, and mobile network information.
serviceUsageInformation.activitiesOnSite: Activities on the Site: We collect records of activities on the BTC-X.PRO website or mobile app, including, any content you post, your BTC-X.PRO Account details, the time, value, and currency of any deposit, withdrawal, or transaction made the payment method.
serviceUsageInformation.locationInformation: Location Information: In accordance with your device permissions, we may collect information about the geo-location of your device.
serviceUsageInformation.informationCollectedByCookies: Information Collected by Cookies and Other Tracking Technologies: We use different technologies to collect information, including cookies and web beacons.

useOfYourPersonalInformation.intro: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve the Services, such as to administer, verify, and maintain your account, to provide the Services you request and customize your experience with us.
useOfYourPersonalInformation.details: We also use the information we collect to:

personalInformationList.personalInformation_1: carry out our obligations owed to you;
personalInformationList.personalInformation_2: comply with our regulatory and other legal obligations;
personalInformationList.personalInformation_3: administer transactions and monitor trading activity on BTC-X.PRO, including by detecting inconsistencies in payments and trades and looking out for potentially illegal activities;
personalInformationList.personalInformation_4: determine whether a payment method is being abused;
personalInformationList.personalInformation_5: compile statistical analysis of the pages of our platform and websites and monitor and analyze our business;
personalInformationList.personalInformation_6: investigate and to manage enquiries, disputes, and legal proceedings and to comply with court orders, mandatory dispute resolution determinations and mandatory government authority or law enforcement orders or directions;
personalInformationList.personalInformation_7: provide information about you and your trading with us to reporting agencies;
personalInformationList.personalInformation_8: participate in crime prevention, legal and regulatory compliance and to assist regulatory, cybercrime, data and information protection agencies and police with their enquiries and enforcement, even if not compelled to do so;
personalInformationList.personalInformation_9: develop and to market other BTC-X.PRO products and services;
personalInformationList.personalInformation_10: novate, transfer or any of the rights or liabilities of the BTC-X.PRO Entity.

sharingOfYourPersonalInformation.intro: We will not share the personal information we hold about you except in the following circumstances:

sharingCircumstances.btcXProEntities: between and among the BTC-X.PRO Entity, BTC-X.PRO, and our current and future parents, affiliates, subsidiaries, and other companies under common control and ownership
sharingCircumstances.thirdPartyVendors: with third-party vendors and service providers who perform services for us, such as identification verification, fraud prevention, advertising, and analytics services
sharingCircumstances.mergerSale: in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing or acquisition of all or a portion of BTC-X.PRO by another company
sharingCircumstances.disclosureLegalProcess: disclosure in accordance with, or required by, any applicable law or legal process, including lawful requests by public authorities to meet national security or law enforcement requirements
sharingCircumstances.inconsistentActions: if we believe your actions are inconsistent with our user agreements or policies, or to protect the rights, property, and safety of BTC-X.PRO or others

sharingOfYourPersonalInformation.detail: We may allow others to provide analytics services and serve advertisements about our products and services on our behalf across the web and in mobile applications. This may involve cookies and other technologies to collect information about your use of the Services. This information may be used by BTC-X.PRO to, among other things, analyze and track data, determine the popularity of certain content, deliver advertising and content targeted to your interests on our Services, and better understand your online activity in connection with the Services.

retentionOfYourPersonalInformation.intro: We may store the information we collect on you for as long as is necessary for the purpose(s) for which we originally collected it, or for other legitimate business purposes, including to meet our legal, regulatory, or other compliance obligations. The period for which we will retain personal information will vary depending on the purposes that it was collected for, as well as the requirements of any applicable law or regulation. If you have a BTC-X.PRO Account, we will store your personal information for as long as you maintain that account, and after you cease holding an account, for as long as we are required to by laws and regulations that are applicable to us. Should you close your account, we may periodically contact you to offer you the opportunity to reactivate your account or participate in any other offers.

securityOfYourPersonalInformation.intro: We protect your personal information by using data security technology and using tools such as firewalls and data encryption. We also require that you use a personal username and password every time you access your account with us. We recommend that you do not re-use a password previously used by you for other platforms/services. Remember that you are ultimately responsible for maintaining the secrecy of your account username and password. We strongly recommend that you do not disclose this information to anyone. We restrict access to personal information at our offices so that only officers and/or employees with a legitimate business purpose can access it.

changesToThisPrivacyPolicy.intro: This Policy will be reviewed and updated from time to time to take account of changes to our operations or practices and, further, to make sure it remains appropriate in light of any changes in law, technology, and the business environment. In the event BTC-X.PRO materially changes this Policy, the revised Policy will promptly be posted to our websites. By opening an account with us, you expressly accept the posting of the revised Policy electronically on our website as actual notice to you. Any personal information held will be governed by our most current Policy.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: BTC-X, LLC (old name ITM-UA, Private Enterprise), a company incorporated in Ukraine, provides BTC-X.PRO mobile trading platform, and/or website https://btc-x.pro that allows users of BTC-X.PRO to obtain economic exposure to the price movement of an underlying financial instrument (including stocks, cryptocurrency pairs, ETFs, commodity futures, index futures, and fiat currency pairs, collectively "Assets") without the need for ownership and physical settlement of the underlying financial instrument (the "Service"). The Service is provided without commissions, leverage fees, or any other kind of fee to users, and all positions will be made available at the real time spot ask price of the relevant exchange where the Asset is trading when opening, reducing and/or closing positions, and the real time spot bid price of the relevant exchange where the Asset is trading when opening, reducing and/or closing positions, in each case as technically achievable by BTC-X.PRO using best commercial efforts. These Terms and Conditions should be read carefully before using the Service or accessing BTC-X.PRO. By using BTC-X.PRO or the Service in any manner, including but not limited to visiting BTC-X.PRO, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, and all other operating rules, policies and procedures that may be published by BTC-X.PRO from time to time, each of which is incorporated by reference and each of which may be updated by BTC-X.PRO from time to time without notice to you. Your use of BTC-X.PRO or the Service is governed by the version of these Terms and Conditions in effect on the date of use. Your continued use of and access to BTC-X.PRO constitutes your acknowledgment of, and agreement to, the then current Terms and Conditions and to having reviewed the most current version of the Terms and Conditions. These Terms and Conditions are in addition to any other agreements between you and BTC-X.PRO, including any customer or account agreements and any other agreements that govern your use of software, products, goods, services, content, tools, and information provided by BTC-X.PRO
terms.general_content: You agree to: a) use the Service in good faith for the purpose of obtaining economic exposure to financial instrument(s) with a view toward profiting on the market activity of such instrument(s), b) refrain from use of the Service for the purpose of hedging or mitigating economic exposure of another user, c) refrain from any use of the Service whereby a bot or other similar software initiates instructions in respect of any position or economic exposure chosen, d) refrain from accessing the Service via a virtual private network (VPN) or modifying your internet protocol (IP) address, e) refrain from any use of the Service in coordination with or on behalf of another person or entity, f) refrain from accessing the Service using more than one account, g) refrain from accessing the Service via an alternatively created account in order to circumvent restrictions otherwise placed upon your BTC-X.PRO account, h) at all times maintain ownership and control of the mobile telephone account associated with your BTC-X.PRO account, i) provide accurate, current, and complete information in connection with BTC-X.PRO account creation and operation, j) maintain the security of your password and identification used in connection with BTC-X.PRO account creation and operation, k) maintain and promptly update any information in connection with BTC-X.PRO account creation and operation, and any other information that you provide to BTC-X.PRO, to keep it accurate, current, and complete, l) accept all risks of unauthorized access to data provided in connection with BTC-X.PRO account creation and operation and any other information you provide to BTC-X.PRO, and m) use the Service in compliance with applicable laws, including, applicable insider trading laws (subparagraphs a) through m) above, collectively the "Purpose of Use Obligation"). The BTC-X.PRO Service may include or make available certain content (the "Content"). Content includes: 1) account positions, balances, transactions, confirmations, and order history; 2) general news and information, commentary, research reports, educational material and information and data concerning the financial markets, financial instruments and other subjects; 3) market data such as quotations for financial instruments, transactions and/or last sale information for completed financial instrument transactions reported; 4) financial and investment interactive tools, such as alerts or calculators; 5) company names, logos, product and service names, trade names, trademarks and services marks (collectively, "Marks") owned by BTC-X.PRO, and Marks owned by certain third parties (each, a "Third-Party Provider" and collectively, the "Third-Party Providers"); and 6) any other information, content, services, or software. Certain Content is furnished by Third-Party Providers. Such Content ("Third Party Content") includes, any information, content, service or software made available by or through social media websites, blogs, wikis, online conferences, telecasts, podcasts, and other forums (collectively, the "Forums"). Third Party Content may be available through framed areas or through hyperlinks to the Third-Party Provider’s websites. BTC-X.PRO does not control, endorse, investigate, or adopt any Third Party Content, and makes no representations or warranties of any kind regarding the Third Party Content, including with respect to its accuracy or completeness. You acknowledge and agree that BTC-X.PRO is not responsible or liable in any manner for any Third Party Content or your reliance upon Third Party Content.
terms.acceptanceOfTerms_content: By using the Service and the Content, you agree to follow and be bound by these Terms and Conditions, including the policies referenced herein. If you do not agree to all these Terms and Conditions, you are not eligible to participate in the Service or otherwise use BTC-X.PRO. These Terms and Conditions apply to all users of BTC-X.PRO or the Service, who in any way use BTC-X.PRO or the Service.
terms.warrantyDisclaimer_content: As with all trading of equities, commodities, cryptocurrencies, and fiat currencies, user-directed exposures and"trading" using BTC-X.PRO carries a level of risk that may not be suitable for all persons interested in trading. You may sustain a loss of some or all of your invested capital, therefore, you should not speculate with capital that you cannot afford to lose. You should seek advice from an independent financial advisor before taking user-directed exposures or"trading" using BTC-X.PRO The Content and the Service are provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. To the fullest extent permitted under applicable law, BTC-X.PRO and the Third Party Providers expressly disclaim all warranties of any kind with respect to the Content and the Service, whether express or implied, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement. BTC-X.PRO makes no representation or warranty, express or implied, with respect to any data provided by Third Party Providers or its transmission, timeliness, accuracy, or completeness, including but not limited to implied warranties or warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose. Neither BTC-X.PRO nor Third Party Providers guarantee the accuracy, timeliness, completeness or usefulness of any Content. You agree to use the Content and the Service only at your own risk. Neither BTC-X.PRO nor the Third Party Providers explicitly or implicitly endorse or approve any Third Party Content. Third Party Content is provided for informational purposes only. The Content or any information contained in BTC-X.PRO is not intended to provide and/or does not constitute financial, legal, tax or investment advice or recommendations. You are solely responsible for determining whether any investment, investment strategy or related transaction is appropriate for you based on your personal investment objectives, financial circumstances and risk tolerance. You are solely responsible for conducting any legal, accounting, or due diligence review. You should consult your legal or tax professional regarding your specific situation. The information contained in BTC-X.PRO or any Content provided through the Service has been prepared without reference to any particular Trader’s financial situation. BTC-X.PRO AND THE THIRD PARTY PROVIDERS WILL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, DAMAGES FOR LOSS OF PROFITS, REVENUE, INCOME, GOODWILL, USE, DATA OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES (EVEN IF BTC-X.PRO OR ANY THIRD PARTY PROVIDER HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES), RESULTING FROM: (1) THE USE OF OR THE INABILITY TO USE THE CONTENT OR THE SERVICE; (2) THE COST OF PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS AND SERVICES RESULTING FROM ANY GOODS, DATA, INFORMATION OR SERVICES PURCHASED OR OBTAINED OR MESSAGES RECEIVED OR TRANSACTIONS ENTERED INTO, THROUGH OR FROM THE SERVICE; (3) ACCESS TO OR ALTERATION OF YOUR ACCOUNT, TRANSMISSIONS OR DATA DUE TO YOUR CONDUCT, INACTION OR NEGLIGENCE; OR (4) ANY OTHER MATTER RELATING TO THE CONTENT OR THE SERVICE.
terms.riskWarning_content_1: BTC-X.PRO does not make recommendations or offer investment advice of any kind. You are solely responsible for evaluating the merits and risks associated with the use of any Content provided through the Service before making any decisions based on such Content. You agree not to hold BTC-X.PRO or any Third-Party Provider liable for any possible claim for damages arising from any decision you make based on the Content or other information made available to you through the Service or any Third-Party Provider websites. Past performance data should not be construed as indicative of future results.
terms.riskWarning_content_2: CONTRACTS FOR DIFFERENCES ("CFDs") ARE COMPLEX INSTRUMENTS AND COME WITH A HIGH RISK OF LOSING MONEY RAPIDLY DUE TO LEVERAGE. THE MAJORITY OF RETAIL INVESTOR ACCOUNTS LOSE MONEY WHEN TRADING CFDs. YOU SHOULD CONSIDER WHETHER YOU UNDERSTAND HOW CFDs WORK AND WHETHER YOU CAN AFFORD TO TAKE THE HIGH RISK OF LOSING YOUR MONEY.
terms.eligibility_content: The Content and the Service are not intended for citizens or residents of the Commonwealth of The Bahamas, the British Virgin Islands, the United States of America (and any of its territories) or Canada (singularly, "a Prohibited Jurisdiction" or collectively, "the Prohibited Jurisdictions"). The Content and the Service shall not be considered a solicitation to any person in any jurisdiction where such solicitation would be illegal. You agree that you are not, nor are you acting on behalf of a person who is, and you are not permitted to access or use the Content or Services if you are: a citizen or resident of, domiciled in, accessing the Service from (via VPN or otherwise), located or incorporated in, a Prohibited Jurisdiction or any of the Prohibited Jurisdictions, any country or other jurisdiction that is sanctioned by any of the Prohibited Jurisdictions, as applicable, or any country or jurisdiction that prohibits access to, or use of, the Content or Service or where it would be illegal according to applicable law for you (by reason of your nationality, domicile, citizenship, residence or otherwise) to access or use the Services or the Content or where the publication or availability of the Services or the Content is prohibited or contrary to local law or regulation, or could subject BTC-X.PRO or any member of the BTC-X.PRO group to any local registration or licensing requirements (the "Eligibility Obligation"). In the event that you violate the Eligibility Obligation or that you give false or unverifiable information or representations as to your citizenship or residency, BTC-X.PRO reserves the right to close your account immediately, liquidate any open positions, reverse trading positions and irrevocably seize, suspend, arrest, and/or reduce your account balance. Any such suspensions or arrests may be maintained indefinitely and for so long as BTC-X.PRO conducts investigations regarding the bases for such suspensions or arrests. You assume all responsibility arising from any access to or use of the Content and Service in the event that you violate the Eligibility Obligation.
terms.automaticMarginCall_content: Your BTC-X.PRO account balance is determined by calculating the difference of: (a) all funds deposited in your BTC-X.PRO account and profits derived from your positions taken using the Service, less (b) withdrawals taken from your BTC-X.PRO account and losses derived from your positions taken using the Service. When using the Service, if your account balance declines to zero, you will be subject to an automatic margin call (an "Automatic Margin Call"), pursuant to which all positions in your BTC-X.PRO account (including, for the avoidance of doubt, all funds deposited in your BTC-X.PRO account) will be closed without recourse to BTC-X.PRO and without informing you in advance. In the event of an Automatic Margin Call you will be notified of same promptly thereafter. In no event will the liability arising from the declining value of your positions be greater than your BTC-X.PRO account balance.
terms.segregation_content: BTC-X.PRO will ensure that any deposited funds of a BTC-X.PRO shall be physically segregated, distinct from BTC-X.PRO’s own account, and shall not be used by BTC-X.PRO for itself or for any purpose other than the purposes mentioned herein.
terms.content_content: Content posted on the Service is published as of its stated date or, if no date is stated, the date of first posting. Neither BTC-X.PRO nor the Third-Party Providers have undertaken any duty to update any such information. BTC-X.PRO does not prepare, edit, or endorse Third Party Content. BTC-X.PRO does not guarantee the accuracy, timeliness, completeness or usefulness of Third Party Content, and is not responsible or liable for any content, advertising, products, or other materials on or available from third party sites. You will not hold BTC-X.PRO and/or any Third-Party Provider liable in any way for (a) any inaccuracy of, error or delay in, or omission of the Content; or (b) any loss or damage arising from or occasioned by i) any error or delay in the transmission of such Content; ii) interruption in any such Content due either to any negligent act or omission by any party or to any "force majeure" (e.g. flood, extraordinary weather conditions, earthquake or other act of God, fire, war, insurrection, riot, labor dispute, accident, action of government, communications or power failure, equipment or software malfunction), or iii) to any other cause beyond the reasonable control of BTC-X.PRO and/ or Third-Party Provider, or iv) non-performance. BTC-X.PRO has no special relationship with or fiduciary duty to you. Neither BTC-X.PRO nor the Third-Party Providers make any representations, warranties or other guarantees as to the accuracy or timeliness of any price quotes. Neither BTC-X.PRO nor the Third Party Providers make any representations, warranties or other guarantees as to the present or future value or suitability of any sale, trade or other transaction involving any particular financial instrument. Content is provided exclusively for personal and noncommercial access and use. No part of the Service or Content may be copied, reproduced, republished, uploaded, posted, publicly displayed, encoded, translated, transmitted or distributed in any way (including "mirroring") to any other computer, server, web site or other medium for publication or distribution or for any commercial enterprise, without BTC-X.PRO’s express prior written consent.
terms.subscriberAgreement_content: You confirm that you are an individual, natural person who receives and uses the Service in each case subject to the following restrictions: (a) You are not a member of (or hold or lease any type of membership in) any exchange; (b) You are not registered or qualified as a professional trader or investment adviser with any stock, commodities or futures exchange or contract market, or with any financial regulatory authority; (c) You are not acting on behalf of an institution that engages in brokerage, banking, investment, or financial activities. Your use of the Service is:. (d) solely for your personal or private use; and (e) limited to managing your own assets, and will not be used in connection with the management of any assets of any third party or parties in any capacity. You further agree and confirm that: a) You will not misrepresent the Service or deface or remove any trademarks included in or transmitted with the Service; b) You will not use the Service for any illegal purpose; c) You will not use the Service for Non-Display use; d) You will not use the Service provided by BTC-X.PRO or any portion thereof in the creation, distribution, settlement, or maintenance of any derivative work (including but not limited to financial products, indexes, quotes, spot prices, curves, surfaces, contracts for difference (CFDs) and other leveraged products, indicative optimized portfolio values (IOPV), net asset value (NAV), or analytical reference figures or values calculated from the Service for purposes of fund administration and portfolio management services, risk management services or valuation services based on the Service) unless you are licensed to do so by BTC-X.PRO; e) You recognize all of BTC-X.PRO’s intellectual property rights and you hereby acknowledge all intellectual property rights that exist between BTC-X.PRO and various exchanges; and f) You shall not distribute or permit distribution of the Service to any entity located in any country subject to comprehensive sanctions by the Office of Foreign Assets Control and/or identified on the U.S. Department of the Treasury’s Specially Designated Nationals and Blocked Persons List.
terms.termination_content: You agree that, with or without notice, BTC-X.PRO may terminate these Terms and Conditions, or suspend your access to the Service or the Content, with or without cause, at any time and effective immediately. These Terms and Conditions will terminate immediately without notice from BTC-X.PRO if you, in BTC-X.PRO’s sole discretion, fail to comply with any provision of these Terms and Conditions. BTC-X.PRO shall not be liable to you or any third party for the termination or suspension of the Service or the Content, or any claims related to such termination or suspension. Any breach of these Terms and Conditions may result in an obligation by you for appropriate reimbursement to BTC-X.PRO of your previously withdrawn account funds, a claim by BTC-X.PRO against you for applicable damages, reversal of applicable trading positions and/or temporary or irrevocable suspension, seizure, arrest, and/or reduction of your account balance. BTC-X.PRO may suspend, discontinue or modify the Service or Content, or any portion thereof (including with respect to leverage or buying power multipliers and allowances and specified buy / sell prices of cryptocurrency pairs that correspond to position sizes in the order book of the relevant exchanges), at any time, and for any reason. You release and agree to indemnify and hold harmless BTC-X.PRO, and the Third-Party Providers, for any loss or damages arising from or relating to such suspension, discontinuation, or modification. A BTC-X.PRO user may terminate use of the Services by withdrawing all funds from the user’s account balance. Withdrawal requests are fulfilled promptly and are not subject to any fee, save with respect to standard blockchain network fees. All provisions of these Terms and Conditions shall survive termination, including, without limitation, warranty disclaimers, indemnity, and limitations of liability.
terms.fees_content: BTC-X.PRO does not charge any brokerage or borrowing fees or commissions to users.
terms.conflictsOfInterest_content: BTC-X.PRO takes all reasonable steps to identify, manage, disclose and record conflicts of interest. Where arrangements made by BTC-X.PRO to manage conflicts of interest are insufficient to ensure, with reasonable confidence, that risks of damage to BTC-X.PRO interests will be prevented, BTC-X.PRO shall clearly disclose to users the general nature and the sources of the conflicts of interest before undertaking conflicted business.
terms.taxes_content: It is each user’s obligation alone to calculate and pay all taxes applicable to such user in their country of residence, or otherwise arising as a result of a user’s use of the Services.
terms.dividends_content: With respect to any company’s specified ex-dividend date, (a) each user using the Service to hold a long position in the applicable stock as of the market open on such date will be entitled to receive the applicable announced dividend per share amount and (b) each user holding a short position in the applicable stock as of the market open on such date shall be obligated to pay BTC-X.PRO the announced dividend per share amount. Such payment may, in BTC-X.PRO’s discretion, be made by way of an irrevocable seizure and/or reduction in such user’s account balance.
terms.terminology_content: References to"investments,""positions,""trades,""trading,""buy," and"sell" as part of the Services, should be understood as, and shall be deemed references to, user-directed exposures to positions of various financial instruments that undergo price fluctuations, without ownership of the underlying financial instrument. Unless the context otherwise requires, whenever the words  "including," "include," or "includes" are used herein, they shall be deemed to be followed by the phrase "without limitation."
terms.third-PartyLimitations_content: In addition to these Terms and Conditions, your access to and use of the Content and the Service is subject to the limitations imposed on BTC-X.PRO and the Service as per any third-party that provides services to BTC-X.PRO, including in respect of any such third-party’s defects, delays, circumstances, obligations and/or terms, and you hereby waive any loss or damages in respect thereof.
terms.defectsAndInconsistencies_content: In the event you detect a defect or inconsistency in the Service or Content you agree to promptly notify BTC-X.PRO of same and to refrain from taking positions in respect thereof. BTC-X.PRO shall have no obligations of payment or otherwise in respect of positions taken relating to any such defect or inconsistency. With respect to a user’s account, BTC-X.PRO reserves the right to reduce such account balance to the extent of any profits derived from the above-described positions. For purposes hereof, a “defect or inconsistency” shall mean a circumstance where the Service or Content operates or is presented contrary to: (a) its actual intended operation or design, or (b) a reasonable interpretation of its intended operation or design.
terms.communications_content: By using the Service or the Content, you expressly consent to any form of recording and retention of any communication, information and data exchanged between you and BTC-X.PRO, any Third Party Provider, and/or its representatives and agents. All communications made at or through the Forums are public. Neither BTC-X.PRO nor the Third Party Providers screen, review, approve or endorse any Third Party Content available on or through the Forums. Reliance on any Third Party Content available on or through the Forums is at your own risk. When discussing a particular company, stock or security in the Forums, you agree to reveal any ownership interest in such company, stock or security. Without limitation, you agree not to do any of the following: a) upload, post, transmit or otherwise make available any Content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, tortuous, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, libelous, invasive of another's privacy (including, but not limited to, any address, email, phone number, or any other contact information without the written consent of the owner of such information), hateful, or racially, ethnically or otherwise objectionable; b) harm minors in any way; c) impersonate any person or entity, including, but not limited to, (i) a BTC-X.PRO or Third-Party Provider manager, employee, agent, or representative or (ii) forum leader, guide or host; d) falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with any person or entity; e) forge headers or otherwise manipulate identifiers in order to disguise the origin of any material; f) upload, post or otherwise transmit any material that you do not have a right to transmit under any law or under contractual or fiduciary relationships (such as inside information, proprietary and confidential information learned or disclosed as part of employment relationships or under nondisclosure agreements); g) upload, post or otherwise transmit any material that infringes any patent, trademark, trade secret, copyright, rights of privacy or publicity, or other proprietary rights of any party; h) upload, post, or transmit unsolicited commercial email or “SPAM,” including, but not limited to, unethical marketing, advertising, or any other practice that is in any way connected with SPAM, such as: (1) sending mass email to recipients who haven't requested email from you or with a fake return address; (2) promoting a site with inappropriate links, titles, or descriptions; or (3) promoting any site by posting multiple submissions in forums that are identical; i) upload, post or otherwise transmit any material that contains software viruses, or any other computer code, files or programs designed to interrupt, destroy or limit the functionality of any computer software or hardware or telecommunications equipment; j) interfere with or disrupt the Service or servers or networks connected to the Service, or disobey any requirements, procedures, policies or regulations of networks connected to the Service; k) intentionally or unintentionally violate any applicable local, state, national or international law, including, but not limited to, regulations promulgated by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Com-mission, any rules of any national or other securities exchange, and any regulations having the force of law; l) “stalk” or otherwise harass another; m) collect or store personal data about other users of the Service; n) promote or provide instructional information about illegal activities, promote physical harm or injury against any group or individual, or promote any act of cruelty; o) promote, offer for sale or sell any security or item, good or service that i) violates any applicable federal, state, or local law or regulation, ii) you do not have full power and authority under all relevant laws and regulations to offer and sell, including all necessary licenses and authorizations, or iii) BTC-X.PRO or the Third-Party Providers determine, in their sole discretion, is inappropriate for sale; p) use the Forums as a forwarding service to another website; or q) access or otherwise use the Forums in any unlawful manner, for any unlawful purpose or in violation of these Terms and Conditions.
terms.externalLinks_content: BTC-X.PRO and/or the Third-Party Providers may provide links to other websites or resources. Because neither BTC-X.PRO or the Third-Party Providers have any control over such sites and resources, you acknowledge and agree that neither BTC-X.PRO nor the Third Party Providers are responsible for the availability of such external sites or resources. BTC-X.PRO and the Third Party Providers do not endorse and are not liable for any content, advertising, products, or other materials on or available through such sites or resources. You further acknowledge and agree that neither BTC-X.PRO nor the Third Party Providers shall be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with use of or reliance on any such content, goods or services available on or through any such site or resource.
terms.applicablePolicies_content: In addition to these Terms and Conditions, your access to and use of the Content and the Service is subject to BTC-X.PRO’s then-current policies relating to the Content and the Service, including, the BTC-X.PRO Privacy Policy available on the Service. You agree to be bound by these policies and all other BTC-X.PRO policies applicable to the access and use of the Content and the Service. By using the Service, you recognize and agree that you will provide confidential personal data to BTC-X.PRO, and you are consenting to have your personal data transferred to and processed by BTC-X.PRO, any Third Party Provider, its affiliates, and/or any applicable regulatory authorities in accordance with applicable law and with the BTC-X.PRO Privacy Policy. You understand that you may withdraw the consent at any time by providing written notice to BTC-X.PRO, and BTC-X.PRO shall then delete your personal data. As part of providing you the Service, BTC-X.PRO may need to provide you with certain communications, such as service announcements and administrative messages. These communications are considered part of the Service, which you may not be able to opt-out from receiving. Your inability to comply with these Terms and Conditions and the BTC-X.PRO trading conditions may result in reversal of applicable trading positions or temporary or irrevocable suspension, seizure, arrest, and/or reduction of your account balance, as determined in BTC-X.PRO’s sole discretion.
terms.acceptanceOfTermsMarketData_title: Acceptance of Terms and Conditions - Market Data Display Services, New York Stock Exchange
terms.acceptanceOfTermsMarketData_content: By using the Service and the Content, you affirm that (a) you have reviewed the terms and conditions of Market Data Display Services of the New York Stock Exchange, found here:
terms.acceptanceOfTermsMarketData_content_2: ("the Market Data Terms"), and that (b) you have consented to and agreed to follow and be bound by the Market Data Terms.
terms.KYCProgram_content: BTC-X.PRO, its subsidiaries, and/or any agents acting on BTC-X.PRO’s behalf, collectively known as BTC-X.PRO, are committed to detecting and deterring persons engaged in money laundering or terrorist financing from using BTC-X.PRO’s Services. BTC-X.PRO is equally committed to ensuring the Services are not used to violate or circumvent economic sanctions. This commitment is honored through the establishment of an Anti-Money Laundering / Anti-Terrorist Financing (AML/ATF) and Sanctions risk and compliance management program (“AML Program”) that is designed to detect and report suspected money laundering and terrorist financing and activity prohibited by sanctions. BTC-X.PRO is subject to, and bound to comply with, the AML/ATF and Sanctions laws and regulations in each of the jurisdictions in which it operates. In accordance with legislative and regulatory requirements, BTC-X.PRO supports policies and requirements that include: 1. senior management oversight of the AML Program; 2. identification of BTC-X.PRO users; 3. customer transactions’ record keeping; 4. ongoing monitoring to detect and report attempted or completed suspicious transactions; 5. customer and transaction screening against terrorist and other sanctions watchlists; 6. ongoing training for employees and those who act on behalf of BTC-X.PRO; 7. assessment of money laundering, terrorist financing and sanctions risks; and 8. independent testing of control effectiveness. The BTC-X.PRO AML Program is routinely evaluated, updated and enhanced in order to reflect changes to BTC-X.PRO’s business activities, as well as applicable supervisory standards and legal requirements. BTC-X.PRO reserves the right to request additional information from users pursuant to the BTC-X.PRO AML Program. Such requests may include, without limitation, evidence regarding user identity, residence, occupation, source of wealth and origin of funds, ownership and control by user of the mobile telephone account, and/or any other information BTC-X.PRO deems appropriate. In the event that you fail to satisfy such requests or that you give false or unverifiable information or representations in response to such requests, BTC-X.PRO reserves the right to irrevocably seize, suspend, and/or arrest your account balance and may withhold any payments (including account balance transfers). Any such suspensions, arrests, or withholdings may be maintained indefinitely and/or for so long as BTC-X.PRO conducts investigations regarding the bases for such suspensions, arrests, or withholdings.
terms.indemnification_content: You will indemnify and hold harmless BTC-X.PRO and the Third Party Providers, and the officers, directors, agents, partners, employees, licensors, distributors, and representatives of BTC-X.PRO and the Third Party Providers, from and against any and all claims, demands, actions, causes of action, suits, proceedings, losses, damages, costs, and expenses, including reasonable attorneys' fees, arising from or relating to breach of the Eligibility Obligation or these Terms and Conditions generally, your access and/or use of, or interaction with the Service or Content (including, Third Party Content), or any act, error, or omission of your use of your account or any user of your account, in connection therewith, including, but not limited to, failure to satisfy the Purpose of Use Obligation, fraud, matters relating to incorrect, incomplete, or misleading information; libel; invasion of privacy; infringement of a copyright, trade name, trademark, service mark, or other intellectual property; any defective product or service or any injury or damage to person or property caused by any products or services sold or otherwise distributed through or in connection with the Service; or violation of any applicable law, including applicable insider-trading laws. With respect to a user’s account, BTC-X.PRO reserves the right to reverse trading positions and/ or irrevocably suspend, seize, arrest, or reduce your account balance, as determined in BTC-X.PRO’s sole discretion, to the extent of any above-described indemnification obligations and/or in the event of a breach of these Terms and Conditions.
terms.customerAssets_content: Interest is not payable by BTC-X.PRO on funds (including cryptocurrencies) deposited by users. BTC-X.PRO shall not be responsible for recompensing any user for any airdrops, hard forks or similar events which may occur in relation to any cryptocurrency deposited by clients to BTC-X.PRO. Funds received by BTC-X.PRO, prior to utilization on the BTC-X.PRO platform, shall be held in wallets originated by reputable third-party providers. All funds and other property of any user which BTC-X.PRO or its affiliates may at any time be carrying for a user (either individually or jointly with others) or which may at any time be in its possession or control or carried on its books for any purpose, including safekeeping, are to be held by BTC-X.PRO as security and subject to a general lien and right of set-off for liabilities of client to BTC-X.PRO whether or not BTC-X.PRO has made advances in connection with such funds or other property, and irrespective of the number of accounts the client may have with BTC-X.PRO BTC-X.PRO shall at no time be required to deliver to any client the identical property delivered to BTC-X.PRO for any account of any client. By accessing the Services and the Content, each user acknowledges and agrees that BTC-X.PRO may withdraw and utilize such user’s deposited funds and other property to: (A) make a payment in line with such user’s instructions; (B) provide sufficient margin in respect of open positions; (C) satisfy obligations to BTC-X.PRO that BTC-X.PRO is entitled to as a result of such Trader utilizing the Services and the Content in accordance with agreed terms; and (D) to set-off any unrealized losses such user has incurred.
terms.revisions_content: BTC-X.PRO reserves the right, at its sole discretion, at any time, to modify or replace any of the terms of these Terms and Conditions, or change, suspend, or discontinue the Service (including without limitation, the availability of any feature, database, or content) by updating this document. Such modification shall become part of these Terms and Conditions and are automatically effective once posted by BTC-X.PRO. You agree to be bound by subsequent revisions and agree to review these Terms and Conditions periodically for changes. The most updated version of this document will be available for your review under the “BTC-X.PRO Terms and Conditions” link that appears on the BTC-X.PRO App. No oral agreements or instructions to BTC-X.PRO in contrary to these Terms and Conditions shall be recognized or enforceable. Your continued use of the Service following the posting of any changes to these Terms and Conditions constitutes acceptance of such changes.

promo.title: ПРОМО
promo.hero_subtitle3: и создали специальный промо-ивент. Выполняйте задания, и вы получите вознаграждение в размере
promo.hero_subtitle5: Эти средства нельзя выводить, но вы можете торговать и выводить полученную прибыль.
promo.form_title_2: Укажите имя или ссылку на профиль.
promo.form_title_5: Укажите имя или ссылку на профиль.
promo.terms_conent1: Время на выполнение заданий не ограничено.
promo.terms_conent2: Задания можно выполнить только один (1) раз.
promo.terms_conent3: Выводить награду нельзя, но вы можете торговать на эти средства и выводить всю полученную прибыль.
promo.terms_conent4: Пример: Вы получили 100 USDT, выполнив задания. Входите в сделку на 100 USDT и фиксируете прибыль +20%. Ваш баланс составит 120 USDT, из которых 20 USDT вы сможете вывести.
promo.terms_conent5: Победители будут уведомлены по электронной почте. Награда зачисляется на аккаунт BTC-X.pro в течение пяти (5) дней с момента подачи данных.
promo.terms_conent6: BTC-X.pro оставляет за собой право дисквалифицировать участников, которые используют нечестные методы, включая массовую регистрацию аккаунтов для получения бонусов, а также любые другие действия, направленные на мошенничество.
promo.terms_conent7: BTC-X.pro сохраняет за собой право окончательной интерпретации условий события.
promo.terms_conent8: Если у вас остались вопросы, свяжитесь с нашей Службой поддержки.
promo.form_error_already_subscribed: Вы уже приняли участие в промо-ивенте

footer.footer_mobile_title: BTC-X платформа для торговли без комиссии
footer.btc-x_data: ООО "BTC-X" (старое название Частное предприятие "ИТМ-ЮА"), зарегистрированное в Украине, предоставляющее мобильную торговую платформу BTC-X.PRO, имеет следующие юридические данные.
footer.btc-x_data_3: Юридический адрес и местонахождение: Украина, 50103, Днепропетровская область, город Кривой Рог, ул. Тильги Степана, дом. 71
footer.footer_title: ТОРГУЙТЕ БЕЗ КОМИССИИ В ТЕЧЕНИЕ ВСЕГО
footer.footer_down: BTC-X.PRO позволяет пользователям получать экономическую выгоду от движения цен финансовых инструментов без необходимости их материального владения. Термины, такие как «торговля», «сделки», «покупать» и «продавать» используемые BTC-X.PRO, следует понимать как риски, связанные с позициями различных финансовых инструментов, которые подвергаются колебаниям цен без права собственности на базовый финансовый инструмент. Пользователь BTC-X.PRO, у которого есть открытая лонг позиция по акции или ETF на момент открытия рынка в день даты экс-дивидендов, получит объявленную сумму дивидендов за каждую акцию его позиции. Пользователь BTC-X.PRO, у которого есть открытая шорт позиция по акции или ETF на момент открытия рынка в день даты экс-дивидендов, заплатит объявленную сумму дивидендов за каждую акцию его позиции. Как и при любой торговле акциями, сырьевыми товарами, криптовалютами и указанныМы валютами, «торговля» с помощью BTC-X.PRO несет уровень риска, который может не подходить для всех лиц, заинтересованных в торговле. Вы можете потерять часть или весь свой инвестированный капитал, поэтому вам не следует спекулировать капиталом, который вы не можете позволить себе потерять. Вам следует проконсультироваться с независимым финансовым консультантом, прежде чем принимать риски или «торговать» с помощью BTC-X.PRO. Информация, размещенная на этом веб-сайте, не применима к жителям США или Канады и не должна использоваться или использоваться в какой-либо стране или юрисдикции, где такое использование или доступ запрещен в соответствии с действующим законодательством.
